update.code: exports.run={usage:[\"spamtag\"],use:\"mention or reply\",category:\"group\",async:async(r,{func:a,mecha:t,froms:n})=>{if(!(n||\"\").replace(/[^0-9]/gi,\"\"))return r.reply(\"Mention or reply chat target.\");for(let e=0;e<10;e++)t.sendMessage(r.chat,{text:\"@\"+n.split(\"@\")[0],mentions:[n]},{ephemeralExpiration:r.expiration}),await a.delay(1e3)},group:!0,premium:!0};
